org.apache.commons.codec.android.EncoderException

Packages that use EncoderException
org.apache.commons.codec.android Interfaces and classes used by the various implementations in the sub-packages. 
org.apache.commons.codec.android.binary Base64, Base32, Binary, and Hexadecimal String encoding and decoding. 
org.apache.commons.codec.android.language Language and phonetic encoders. 
org.apache.commons.codec.android.language.bm   
org.apache.commons.codec.android.net Network related encoding and decoding.
